column4: is there a way to force the dhcp client to request a specific option? I set up option 66 (tftp server) on my router, but I need to make sure it actually works correctly
no you set the dhcp server to GIVE it options. If you want to do it for a speficic host lock it by mac address
: so it doesn't specifically request what it wants. So if I used dhcpdump, and didn't see the option I wanted in the response, it's not set up right?
it sends out a DHCPREQ, to which the server gives it DHCPOFFERs and then the cleint gives back a DHCPACK.
